item.title: How to optimally alter mysql tables using percona-tools
item.description: Introduction You have to be very carefull when you are going to run an ALTER Table in the production Database. MySQL’s ALTER TABLE can become a serious problem especially with very large tables. Many people have experience with ALTER TABLE operations that have taken hours or days to complete.
